headline: Does GM’s 21% Rally Signal Opportunity After Driverless Car Push in 2025?
summary: If you are looking at General Motors stock right now and wondering whether to hold, buy, or sell, you are definitely not alone. There has been a lot to digest in the past few months, with the stock surging nearly 21% over the past year and more than doubling its five-year return. That sort of performance tends to get attention, especially when news headlines are focused on tariffs, new supply deals, and even a renewed push into driverless cars. It is a lot for any investor to weigh, but the...
